desc: We need a 3D DWG model, that has been created in AutoCAD, converting to a 3D Studio Max Assembly Animation and render using Photo realistic materials. Materials and finishes will be specified as part of the brief. The AVI render will last approximately 1 minute and will be in a simple environment, options of which I would like to assess for suitability.The model is of a modular home, made of 3 generic panellised boxes, the first of which will be represented  is an assembly of all of the components of the box, the second and third box will then drop in 'assembled' to complete the plan; following this a generic roof will lower onto the boxes to complete the concept.There is no requirement to include furniture, I am only interested in the construction of the boxes.I have attached a basic sample that we have created in 3ds max and we need to take this to completion. Please note that this has been compressed to .rar formatPlease also note that the native .max file created and all materials used to dress the model need to be provided as deliverables along with the completed AVI file.The AVI will be provided in FULL HD resolution.Please use the code 'WABI' in your responses.
title: 3D Studio Max Amination and Render from a DWG model - 20/08/2017 23:12 EDT

desc: Hello,I am currently looking for a team to animate the *1400 word* Production Script of the children's book, "The Morning's Star" into a 90 second movie trailer.I want to utilize a movie trailer to encourage young readers to pick up a book. By demonstrating the feelings of the underlying themes of the story through a short & powerful visual synopsis, I believe we can stimulate non reading/writing learners to download and read the illustrated book.THEMES:•	Getting lost looking for yourself•	Learning to be part of something instead of being someone•	Discovering the greatest purpose of all•	Leaving something behind•	Discovering the 'what' to your 'who'•	Creating your own wake... Creating you.MATERIALS:This work leaves a lot of conceptual freedom for the right team. I don't have any visual images rendered from the physical descriptions however, the original children's story as well as the actual projects 'Production Script' are complete.I’m looking for 3D quality similar to “Exode team’s” short film: [url removed, login to view]It doesn’t need to the same or even similar style, I’m solely referencing the quality of their work on this animation.REQUIREMENTS:•	Consistent communication since we will be working remotely.•	Proven ability to finish a similar project from start to finish in 1-3 months.o	Pre-production, Production, & Post Production.CONTRACT & TERMS:•	Creative Credit to all individuals involved in the end content produced.•	The project has a fixed cost and does not have room for adjusting.•	I hold all IP rights to the characters and concepts detailed in the reference documents.•	IP ownership of all work produced under Freelancer contacts signed as a result of this listing—including but not limited to all artwork, sketches, assets, models, props, environments, whether interim or completed, rigs and textures implemented—including their respective computer files, will lie with me.•	Please bear the above in mind when using third party generators, software, topologies, etc. that limit usage or IP ownership or for which IP rights remain with the originating party. These can be used, but will need to review the T&C docs first.•	All Interim and final files are to be delivered to me (or made available to me for download) as soon as they become available.I have attached the synopsis of the book as well. If interested in being part of this project please attach some of your relevant work as well as a fixed cost proposal.
title: 90 SECONDS, 3D ANIMATED MOVIE TRAILER

desc: I need a 3D model of something. The 3D Model Reviews are conducted to ensure that the plant design conforms to the customer’s project requirements.  The review is carried out in accordance with sound engineering practice to ensure that all the following requirements are met:ProcessSafetyConstructabilityBudgetOperabilityMaintainabilityThe 3D Model Reviews are the primary means of reviewing the:Plant layoutDesign complianceConfirmation of compliance to the P&ID’sThe 3D Model Reviews are of critical importance to the success of a project.  They typically replace the traditional Squad Checks and eliminate the interpretation of:General arrangement drawingsPiping plans and elevationsPipe support locationsStructural plans and detailsCable tray plans and elevationsInstrumentation layoutsIt is therefore important that all relevant disciplines participate in the Model Reviews and resolution of issues raised in the Model Review Report.3DDraughting apply a typical 3 staged approached to model development.Stage 1:Stage 1 typically refers to 0% to approximately 30% model completion and could include the following:General room/clean room/plant layoutMajor equipment locationsLifting beams/hoistsAgreed space reserve volumesAccess and egress for operability, maintainability, and constructabilityMaterial and personnel movementPiping materials specificationAll large bore piping and stress critical lines that may effect equipment locationRepresentative systems/processes that will be duplicated throughout models.
title: Design project

desc: YOU MUST HAVE EXAMPLES OF WORK OR A REELBriefThe project is for a  non-profit government scientific centre supporting the progress and advancement of science and technology, supported by the private sector.The purpose is to showcase their 5-year strategy by explaining it in three parts, then a brief presentation to the different facilities they started, and their purpose.Requirements- I will be providing the script along with the voiceover. I only need the motion graphics animation from your end (concept/design/illustration/animation) no need for music/sfx- The style will be a mix of 3D animation and 2D motion graphics elements.- I will be providing a script breakdown with some key visuals - and storyboard with words- before animation, i need a few style frames of certain key moments - I will provide art direction.- Motion design for a 3-4 minute animation project.- Delivery of files and source after finishing. Video resolution 1080p 25fps.Themes/other notes- Science, technology, energy solar, wind, water, future, middle east, arab,- colours: orange, white are the brand colours.- will be in English and Arabic, VO will be the same length. Arabic will be provided in vector files.I will be assisting in Art direction and add futuristic design elements,  I have the script and will share if you are short listed -  it is wordy and corporate, but I hope we can make it visually entertaining and tell a simple story using slick animation and strong visually interesting images.TimeWe have around 21 days to deliverBudgetAround 1500 USDReferences / Your skill and quality of work should match the level of the first 2 videos.1. [url removed, login to view] - I like the story telling style of this and the way is flows with the transitions - the seamless transitions, also the animation is smooth to move some elements in 9/10 sec and also around sec 44, another thing is that there is a lot of variation going on, so sometimes you see particles, very nicely designed elements. The mix of glows + 2d elements is nice to have as well2. [url removed, login to view] - Again the way this flows and animates is nice3. [url removed, login to view] - I like the look and design of this, future techIf you have any questions please let me know, I am looking to start this project in the next few days.
title: Create an 2D/3D Motion Graphics Animation
